metadata.description: Teenage slacker Kawahira Keita is the descendent of a long line of Inukami tamers, but he seems to lack the necessary skills and has been forsaken by his family. Everything changes when he meets a beautiful Inukami named Yoko, who, at first glance, looks graceful and obedient... but Keita soon discovers she is feisty and out of control. Can Keita prove his worth and tame her or will this wild Inukami prove too much for the frisky teen to handle?
metadata.name: Inukami!
